title: Booru Extractor
name: booruextractor

preferences.name: imagesDirectory
preferences.title: Images directory path
preferences.description: Directory, where images should be downloaded

preferences.name: underTags
preferences.title: Under tags
preferences.description: Tags, which should have sub-directory in gallery directory. Space-separated. If more than one present, first in the list will be used.

description: Add-on for automatic extraction of images from image page of booru-like and other galleries. Currently Gelbooru, Danbooru, Safebooru, Booru.org, e-hentai.org, Flickr is supported.
author: VA
